bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jing si 驚死 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：醇 酒，驚怖死，俗名嚇死，灌之 , “For [appearance of] death from being horrified, commonly called ‘[appearance of] death from intimidation’, unmixed wine is to be forcibly instilled [into the patient]”. Jing bu tiao 經不調 , menstrual irregularity [1]

Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 . NKBW 16: 補陰丸，治婦人 百疾，或經不調，或崩中漏不止 , “The pills to supplement yin, they cure all types of women’s disease, menstrual irregularity , or collapsing center with incessant leaking”.
